## Sentiment Analysis

We will use textblob to proceed with sentiment Analysis. Sentiment analysis is use for determining the feelings of the customer from the text. We will categorize the feedback text of customer to positive and negative experience. 

Although this sentiment analysis is not perfect, we can get some quickly summarize of the text, especially if you have so much text that a human reader cannot analyze it. For this project, the goal is to classify reviews based on customers' text.
